instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820 3330 no back Light, and power issuse
threads.message: 820 3330, no liquid damage, short on back light circuit. Also having in issuse powering on without magsafe. Machine will stay on without magsafe connected. Machine also powers on the moment magsafe is connected. Can this issuse be caused by back light short or is this a separate issue altogether? I did not want to waste my time fixing the backlight, until I knew this power issue could be solved. Green light on magsafe 12.56v g3h....

threads.title: 820 3330 no back Light, and power issuse
threads.message: Sounds like a dud battery, BIL showing anything? The short on backlight is probably corroded connector and/or cable. Shorted connector at the LCD side also happens with these.

threads.title: 820 3330 no back Light, and power issuse
threads.message: Got new batt ordered, C9799 was the cause of BL death, thanks!
